publicly that want to see the collision of two had been fired over the head coach of Chelsea between. If Lineker dream come true, does not intend to be the final match-ups between the two counter-masters. However, compared to Real Madrid's offensive strength of the group is more powerful, better state, and C Lo is fighting in the country, will inevitably burst of strong combat effectiveness.Of course, Simeone's Atletico nature wilnike roshe run comprar l not easily let Chelsea do so. If the final staged in Madrid derby, the two teams that will be 252 official games derby, Real Madrid had 134 wins and 56 level 62 negative. The two sides have played against this season, four times. League first leg, Atletico Madrid with Diego — Costa goal, 1-0 victory over Real Madrid. King's Cup semi-final first leg, Mary and forcing the defender Pepe scored two own goals, Hesse break, Real Madrid 3 goals wins; second leg match C Luo penalty meritorious deeds, Hesse seal the victory. League second round, a 2-2 draw away to Atletico Madrid, Benzema and C Ronaldo scored for Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid Cork Canadian ratio of accomplishment. The Madrid derby moved to Lisbon It will also be a counter-master duel. April 30 morning, a total score of 5-0 eliminated Real Madrid, Bayern, head reached the Champions League final. Premiership two generals in different ways to their former teammate or younger sent a congratulatory message. 4-0 away victory in the second round of the, C Ronaldo scored twice, which also includes a very nice kick. After the game, the camera captures the C Ronaldo and Roy — Keane two former Manchester United legend hug picture, Manchester United has won seven league championship trophy Keane own little secret of the Portuguese nor appreciation

of love, personal delivered his message.Roy — Keane at Manchester United during the 1994-2004 decade, as the Red Devils won, including seven league titles and a Champions League title, C Lo is brought to Old Trafford by six years to three league titles and one Champions League. Last night C Lo scored his first Champions League knockout 15 and 16 goals, a record previously held by Macy refreshed. With the legendary hero for Manchester nike air presto camo baratas United, Keane was full of praise for the younger generation, after the game, he commented:. "Talented boy, when he was sold to Manchester United, Real Madrid 80 million is too cheap."Meanwhile, Arsenal are in Ozil posting on Twitter, congratulating his former teammate Ramos, praised his incredible wonderful performance. Real Madrid scored four goals last night, in addition to C Ronaldo scored twice, and the other half are defender Ramos made his mark yesterday, a man named Wilson Group Singapore gambling man in the book revealed that he had helped Honduras and Nigeria reached the 2010 World Cup.Wilson was arrested in Finland in 2011, was sentenced to two years' imprisonment. Previously, he has admitted to manipulate the results of a number of friendlies by bribing soccer officials and players, this is his first World Cup qualifier revealed manipulation. He said he was handling three players guaranteed to win Nigeria, with a $ 100,000 bribe after the Football Association of Mozambique, and Tunisia so that they guarantee not to lose the game, so avoid Tunisia squeezed Nigeria. Eventually, Mozambique incredible 1-0 victory over Tunisia. "My plan was successful, I was the unsung hero of the World Cup in South Africa, Nigeria scored." Wilson wrote in his book, "Nigeria and Honduras into the World Cup

is my personal achievement, but I can not tell anyone." Tomorrow morning, another a Champions League semi-final second leg between Chelsea and Atletico Madrid will start Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho resorted to the outside world if they would be criticized, "coach tactics" The last two weeks, Mourinho's "tactical coach" has become a buzzword international football after four lumbar away draw with Atletico Madrid, and get away with five defenders Liverpool. This time back home, although Mourinho has not made it clear to continue to put the bus, but the team has been instructed to make a smoke bomb to Atletico Madrid.Injured in the first game of the season may be claimed for reimbursement goalkeeper Petr Cech, resumed training yesterday, and said that "it is possible to play the semi-final with Atletico"; lnike air presto camo ikewise Mourinho characterized as "the season," Terry, " If no adverse reactions will play even starts. "However, Atletico coach Simeone Liverpool too underestimate the enemy apparently learned the lesson: "There is no doubt that Chelsea are a strong team, I know they will give us much trouble transfer market is not yet open, one escaped.
